titles.ar: باب الرَّجُلُ يَتَزَوَّجُ بِالْمَرْأَةِ عَلَى أَنَّهَا بِكْرٌ فَيَجِدُهَا غَيْرَ عَذْرَاءَ
titles.en: Chapter 69 – The man marries with the woman upon a stipulation that she is a virgin, so he finds her without virginity

titles.ar: باب الرَّجُلُ يَتَزَوَّجُ بِالْمَرْأَةِ عَلَى أَنَّهَا بِكْرٌ فَيَجِدُهَا غَيْرَ عَذْرَاءَ
titles.en: Chapter 69 – The man marries with the woman upon a stipulation that she is a virgin, so he finds her without virginity

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: صحيح - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (0/164)
text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ خَالِدٍ عَنْ سَعْدِ بْنِ سَعْدٍ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ الْقَاسِمِ بْنِ فُضَيْلٍ عَنْ أَبِي الْحَسَنِ ( عليه السلام ) فِي الرَّجُلِ يَتَزَوَّجُ الْمَرْأَةَ عَلَى أَنَّهَا بِكْرٌ فَيَجِدُهَا ثَيِّباً أَ يَجُوزُ لَهُ أَنْ يُقِيمَ عَلَيْهَا قَالَ فَقَالَ قَدْ تُفْتَقُ الْبِكْرُ مِنَ الْمَرْكَبِ وَ مِنَ النَّزْوَةِ .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Muhammad Bin Khalid, from Sa’ad Bin Sa’ad, from Muhammad Bin Al Qasim Bin Fuzayl,

(It has been narrated) from Abu Al-Hassan<sup>asws</sup> regarding the man who married the woman upon a stipulation that she was a virgin, so he found her as having been married before. Is it allowed for him that he resides with her?’ He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘The virginity can be torn from the riding and from the jumping’.
en.sarwar: 1. Muhammad ibn Yahya has narrated from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Khalid from Sa‘d ibn Sa‘d from Muhammad ibn al-Qasim ibn Fudayl who has said the following: “About the case of a man who marries a woman as a virgin but finds that she is not virgin; if it is permissible to live with her, abu al-Hassan has said, ‘At certain times it is torn because of riding or jumping.’”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: صحيح - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (0/164)
text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ جَعْفَرٍ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ جَزَّكٍ قَالَ كَتَبْتُ إِلَى أَبِي الْحَسَنِ ( عليه السلام ) أَسْأَلُهُ عَنْ رَجُلٍ تَزَوَّجَ جَارِيَةً بِكْراً فَوَجَدَهَا ثَيِّباً هَلْ يَجِبُ لَهَا الصَّدَاقُ وَافِياً أَمْ يُنْتَقَصُ قَالَ يُنْتَقَصُ .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Abdullah Bin Ja’far, from Muhammad Bin Jazzaki who said,

‘I wrote to Abu Al-Hassan<sup>asws</sup> asking him<sup>asws</sup> about a man who married a virgin girl, so he found her as having been married before, and for her is the dower. Should he be loyal (to the dower) or reduced (amount)?’ He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘Reduced’.
en.sarwar: 2. Muhammad ibn Yahya has narrated from ‘Abd Allah ibn Ja’far from Muhammad ibn Jazzak who has said the following: “I once wrote to abu al-Hassan, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, and asked about the case of a man who married a virgin girl but found out that she was not virgin if it was obligatory to pay complete mahr (dower) or less. He (the Imam) answered, ‘It is less.’”
